abstract: This report presents the history of a 35-year-old patient with adenoid cystic cervical cancer stage IIIB. Adenoid cystic carcinoma of the uterine cervix is a rare disease with poor prognosis. Following irradiation therapy, the patient was declared tumor free, and 20 years after diagnosis and treatment, she has no pathological signs or symptoms.
title: [Adenoid cystic carcinoma of the uterine cervix].
